body_html:
Glad to hear that you were able to get this going @mohammadul .
We are unlikely to have the bandwidth to support any official Python 2.7 binary releases, but if you'd like to contribute the changes you had to made that would be great as it may help others that need to use Python 2.7 on Windows. Feel free to send a pull request.

Closing this out since it isn't a bug or feature request.

We are unlikely to have the bandwidth to support any official Python 2.7 binary releases, but if you'd like to contribute the changes you had to made that would be great as it may help others that need to use Python 2.7 on Windows. Feel free to send a pull request.

body:
Glad to hear that you were able to get this going @mohammadul .
We are unlikely to have the bandwidth to support any official Python 2.7 binary releases, but if you'd like to contribute the changes you had to made that would be great as it may help others that need to use Python 2.7 on Windows. Feel free to send a pull request.

Closing this out since it isn't a bug or feature request.
